column4: whats the difference between nvidia-new-kernel-source and nvidia-kernel-source when I try to runt the Rrestricted Drivers Manager it compains that nvidia-kernel-source is not installed but seems like it does not exist anymore
IIRC, the older one was kept for backwards compatibility situations.  Maybe they're resolved making it no longer needed?
is that what you already have installed?
I should warn you that I've not had a lot of experience with proprietary video drivers: I either got them to work or i gave up
